meanings.definition: The angular distance of a place north or south of the earth's equator, usually expressed in degrees and minutes.
meanings.sent1: The colatitudes of different cities determine their distance from the equator.
meanings.sent2: When studying geography, understanding colatitudes is essential.
meanings.sent3: The colatitudes of the penguins made them experts in navigating the icy terrain.
meanings.sent4: In the game of hide and seek, knowing the colatitudes of the hiding spots is key to winning.
meanings.sent5: The colatitudes of the stars guided the ancient sailors across the vast oceans.

meanings.definition: The parallel lines of latitude on a map or globe.
meanings.sent1: The map displayed the colatitudes clearly, helping travelers plan their routes.
meanings.sent2: The colatitudes on the globe made it easier to locate specific regions.
meanings.sent3: The colatitudes on the map seemed to dance as the globe spun around.
meanings.sent4: The colatitudes on the globe resembled a ladder reaching up to the North Pole.
meanings.sent5: The colatitudes on the map were like invisible threads connecting distant lands.
